metadata.name: HackTool - Potential CobaltStrike Process Injection
metadata.comment: Detects a potential remote threat creation with certain characteristics which are typical for Cobalt Strike beacons

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('4') AND (endswith(lower(module.start_address), lower('0b80')) OR endswith(lower(module.start_address), lower('0c7c')) OR endswith(lower(module.start_address), lower('0c88'))))

output.summary: Detects a potential remote threat creation with certain characteristics which are typical for Cobalt Strike beacons
